entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries near the mountains overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
